Shigion Akiyama of Tsubaki Factory, Beyooooonds, and Yutana Sato of Seasoning's present Halo! STE!
It is time to say goodbye. Here is an announcement.
Project 2024 Winter 3 of Us is now underway. Tsubaki Factory and Beyooooonds will be in Team A with Morning Musumeã€‚ Project 2024 Winter 3 of Us is now underway.
The next show will be in Osaka on January 20 and 21. If you are in the area, please check it out.
And Tsubaki Factory new album 3rd Moment will be released on February 21.
I feel that Tsubaki Factory's music has a really wide range, and I hope that you can feel the difference between our songs.
And Tsubaki Factory's major debut 7th anniversary live will be held on March 10 at Ichikawa City Cultural Hall.
We hope it will be a live performance that is a little unprecedented, so please come and visit us.
We, Tsubaki Factory, will participate in the 6th Nakagusuku Festival on February 27.
There will be many idols performing at the event at Shinjuku Rainy, and we, Tsubaki Factory, will do our best not to be outdone.
Beyooooonds will be released on Blu-ray in the spring of 2024 for the theater girls' club Biospy: The Missing Attache Case.
The Tokyo performance and the first Osaka performance are both included in the video, so please compare the two performances and enjoy.
And Hello! Project will be hosting the 2024 by Satomi Satoyama Movement for Carbon Neutrality at Makuhari Messe on March 30 and 31.
I look forward to this event very much every year.
We will do our best, so please come and visit us.
Hello! Ste is a channel where the members of Hello! Project appear more and more.
New videos will be uploaded every Wednesday, so please subscribe to our channel.
Please.
The partners were Maho Akiyama of Tsubaki Factory, Beyooooonds, and Kana Satoyoshi of Seasonings.
Good-bye.
Thank you for watching.
